roleset.name: to press together or make more compact
roleset.note: COMPRESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'compress' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from compress.01-v predicate notes)
COMPRESSION-N NOTES: Corresponds with compress.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from compression.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: CFCs are the primary ingredient in a gas , often referred to [*] by the Du Pont trade name Freon , which [*T*-2]-1 is compressed [*-1] to liquid form [*] to serve as the cooling agent in refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment .
example.arg: [*] to serve as the cooling agent in refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The EMT's compression of her head wound with a sterile cloth prevented a lot of blood loss.
